meanings.definition: Feel intense or passionate dislike for someone.
meanings.sent1: She hates doing chores around the house.
meanings.sent2: He hates when it rains during his outdoor plans.
meanings.sent3: The cat hates taking baths and always tries to escape.
meanings.sent4: The old tree hates the strong winds that shake its branches.
meanings.sent5: The child hates eating vegetables more than anything else.

meanings.definition: Have a strong aversion to something.
meanings.sent1: He hates the taste of mushrooms in his food.
meanings.sent2: She hates the smell of the chemicals in the cleaning products.
meanings.sent3: The dog hates wearing the costume for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The bird hates being confined in a cage and longs to fly free.
meanings.sent5: The student hates the sound of the alarm clock in the morning.

meanings.sent1: The teacher hates when students talk during the lesson.
meanings.sent2: He hates the way his colleague always interrupts him in meetings.
meanings.sent3: The robot hates the error messages that pop up on its screen.
meanings.sent4: The judge hates when lawyers try to manipulate the truth in court.
meanings.sent5: The parent hates seeing their child disobeying rules repeatedly.
